rules.justification: The ID range 'XXX' is not valid. It must be within the range allocated to the partner for AppSource, within the range '[1000000..75999999]' allocated to AppSource applications, and outside the range '[50000..99999]' allocated to per-tenant customizations.

The app.json file must specify an Azure Application Insights resource with the property 'applicationInsightsKey' for monitoring operations related to this extension. See https://docs.microsoft.com/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/administration/telemetry-overview for additional information.
Extension' is being deprecated in the versions: '4.0' or greater. The Extension compilation target is being deprecated. Use Cloud instead. This warning will become an error in a future release.
The application object or method 'Create' has scope 'OnPrem' and cannot be used for 'Extension' development.
The compilation target is set to 'OnPrem', but it must be set to 'Cloud' or 'Extension.'
The name of FileMgt is not valid. The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
